data.name: DevSpace
data.description: DevSpace is an annual developer’s conference that takes place in Huntsville, Alabama. Fueled by extensive space and missile research and a vibrant, emerging start-up culture, Huntsville is a market poised and ready to burst onto the national stage.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: O’Reilly Software Architecture Conference
relatedRecords.description: Go deeper and broader on crucial topics such as microservices, serverless, leadership, and domain-driven design. Get the training you need to stay at the forefront of software architecture.

relatedRecords.name: Modesto-Berkeley DevFest 2019
relatedRecords.description: Hey GDGers, we know October is a long ways out, but we’re super excited to bring you the first DevFest to be hosted in Modesto (and our second partnering with GDG Berkeley)! Location is TBD, but the date will be October 19, 2019 so mark your calendars now and get ready for a day full of awesome tech…
